open_prs.title: Personal dashboard: Stats on quality of contributions
Testing Gen AI results over time
Avoid sending receipts to gemini, unless ReceiptAssistant is used
Prices API: allow filtering using list of values (in, overlap)
Add a way to gather user feedback
Price stats API: Allow stats to be grouped by specific field
